(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5D to forge (D1)

Bane Blades are horrible swords made from a strange alloy crafted in the Underworld. A cut from a Bane Blade will fester and rot within moments. Bane Blades are often used by the servants of the King of the Underworld.
